headline: Drilling Down On The Details: CMA Provisionally Accepts Complex Phase 1 Remedies In Schlumberger/ChampionX Merger
summary: On 10 April 2025, the CMA announced that it had provisionally found that undertakings in lieu of reference offered by Schlumberger Limited and ChampionX Corporation could address the competition...
